ðŸ“– Summary: QUIK is an open-source Android SMS messenger app that aims to provide a more feature-rich and customizable experience than the default messaging application. It offers features such as scheduled messages, message backup, speech-to-text integration, message blocking, voice messages, and support for various attachments, providing users with greater control and flexibility over their messaging.
